short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better manage your FB contacts, organize communications, create your own Sales Pipelines, and broadcast messages to your prospects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TAMS Blaster will ADD necessary features that are missing from FB Messenger to...

* Better Manage Your Contacts
* Organize Your Communications
* Create your own Sales Pipelines.
* Broadcast messages to your Leads.

Only for members of TTAM$ via private invitation.
